overview:
Asif is probably most advance young Bangladeshi entrepreneur. He started everything himself and now his company is serving for better web experience and usability.

M Asif Rahman, Online Nick â€œAsif2BDâ€. He started his journey with internet from his fresh year of university. Previously he was into marketing, journalism & computer stuff.

He started loving WordPress from its early time, when most of people was into other CMS and blogging stuff. But he took it seriously. He was not even a web programmer. He learnt Programming Language Unix C during University, But he loved programming very much. He was not in Computer Science, his subject in University was Electrical & Telecommunications Engineering. But he soon got into web site thing and in WordPress. firstly is was his hobby and passion to play with code and make site.

Soon it became so vast he started a office with only few close people and one part-time developer. But within year his company grew bigger, moved to new office, form a company, A. R. Communications.

Asif is Founder CEO Of A. R. Communications in Short ARCom. He is WordPress Enthusiast, Web Entrepreneur, Workaholic and Loving Man. In his Blog he xxpress How he Sees The World and What he Learns from Every Day Journey.
